text: to vah sabake sab (masal masal) khade qie jaate the (garaz is tarah lashakar chalata) yahaan tak ki jab (ek din) cheeteeyon ke maidaan mein aa nikale to ek cheeteen bolee ai cheeteeyon apane apane bil mein ghus jao- aisa na ho ki sulemaan aur unaka lashkar tumhe raund daale aur unhen usakee khabar bhee na ho
